          <title>
            <string language="en">Reducing friction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verringern von von Friktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réduction du frottement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reduzindo a fricção</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riduzione dell'attrito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μείωση της τριβής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reducción de la fricción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how a block of stone can be moved using rollers to reduce friction.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friction force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">inclined plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sliding</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slope</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie ein Block des Steins 
mit Rollen verschoben werden kann, Friktion zu verringern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment un bloc de 
pierre peut être déplacé utilisant des rouleaux pour réduire le 
frottement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como um bloco da pedra 
pode ser movido usando rolos reduzir a fricção.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come un blocco della 
pietra può essere spostato per mezzo dei rulli per ridurre l'attrito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς μια ομάδα 
δεδομένων της πέτρας μπορεί να κινηθεί χρησιμοποιώντας τους 
κυλίνδρους για να μειώσει την τριβή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo un bloque de la 
piedra se puede mover usando los rodillos para reducir la fricción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geneigte Fläche</string>
